RDÁèæË≤®ÂÆåÊï¥ÊîªÁï• ÈÉΩÊî∂ËóèÂú®ÈÄôË£°Èù¢‰∫Ü „ÄÅ Ê≠§ÁâàÊú¨Ê≤íÊúâÂõûÁ≠ñ

//@version=5
indicator("üìå4H ÊôÇÈñìËª∏ RDÁèæË≤® ÂÆåÊï¥ÊîªÁï• ", overlay=true)


//https://tw.tradingview.com/watchlists/191878646/
//‰∏äÈù¢ÊòØÊàëÁöÑTradingViewÊ∏ÖÂñÆ-‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ËøΩËπ§
//RDÁèæË≤®ÂÆåÊï¥ÊîªÁï• ÈÉΩÊî∂ËóèÂú®ÈÄôË£°Èù¢‰∫Ü „ÄÅ Ê≠§ÁâàÊú¨Ê≤íÊúâÂõûÁ≠ñ

// ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
// ‚îÇ ‚ë† RD ÂçÄÂ°äÔºàRVSÔºèGC-DC Á≠âÔºâ               ‚îÇ
// ‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ
// === EMA 10‚ÄÜ/‚ÄÜ20
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Len")
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Len")
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Len")
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)
goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

plotshape(goldenCross, "GC",  shape.triangleup , location.belowbar,
          size=size.small, color=color.lime, text="GC\n", textcolor=color.rgb(0, 255, 55))
plotshape(deathCross , "DC",  shape.triangledown, location.abovebar,
          size=size.small, color=color.red , text="DC\n", textcolor=color.rgb(255, 0, 0))

// === RVS Âà§ÂÆö
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       =  isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         =  isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === GC ‚Üí RVS Á´ãÂç≥Âá∫Â†¥
// ‚Ä£ Á¥ÄÈåÑÊúÄÂæå‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÈáëÂèâ
var int lastGcBar = na
if goldenCross
    lastGcBar := bar_index

// ‚Ä£ Ëã•ÈáëÂèâÂæåÂá∫ÁèæÁ©∫È†≠ RVSÔºèRVS-‚òÖÔºåËß∏ÁôºÂá∫Â†¥
gcExitRaw = not na(lastGcBar) and bar_index > lastGcBar and (rvsRed or strongRvsRed)

// ‚Ä£ Âè™ÊèêÁ§∫‰∏ÄÊ¨°
var int lastGcExitBar = na
gcExit = gcExitRaw and (na(lastGcExitBar) or bar_index - lastGcExitBar > 0)
if gcExit
    lastGcExitBar := bar_index

plotshape(gcExit, title="GC Âá∫", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small,
          color=color.rgb(255, 235, 59, 100), text="\n\n\n\GCÂá∫(ÁúãÂÇôË®ª)", textcolor=color.rgb(255, 255, 255))
          
// === DC ‚Üí RVS Âá∫Â†¥
var int lastDcBar = na
if deathCross
    lastDcBar := bar_index

dcExitRaw   = not na(lastDcBar) and bar_index > lastDcBar and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
confirmDc   = goldenCross or close > ema10 or close > ema20
dcExit      = dcExitRaw and confirmDc
var int lastDcExitBar = na
dcExitFinal = dcExit and (na(lastDcExitBar) or bar_index - lastDcExitBar > 0)
if dcExitFinal
    lastDcExitBar := bar_index

plotshape(dcExitFinal, title="DC Âá∫", style=shape.labelup,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small,
          color=color.rgb(255, 235, 59, 100), text="\n\n\n\DC Âá∫(ÁúãÂÇôË®ª", textcolor=color.rgb(255, 255, 255))







// === üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÈÇèËºØ
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢
plotshape(low  > ema10 and low  > ema20, "Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠",
          shape.triangleup , location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(high < ema10 and high < ema20, "Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠",
          shape.triangledown, location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVSÔºèRVS-‚òÖ Ê®ôË®ò
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, "RVS Â§ö",
          shape.labelup , location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , "RVS Á©∫",
          shape.labeldown, location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, "RVS-‚òÖ Â§ö",
          shape.labelup , location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="‚òÖÂ§ö", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , "RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫",
          shape.labeldown, location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="‚òÖÁ©∫", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰Ωè", shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè", textcolor=color.white)

// === RVS ÂèçËΩâ & ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º
recentLongRvs  = rvsGreen[1] or rvsGreen[2] or strongRvsGreen[1] or strongRvsGreen[2]
recentShortRvs = rvsRed  [1] or rvsRed  [2] or strongRvsRed  [1] or strongRvsRed  [2]
bodyTouchEma   = (ema10 <= bodyHigh and ema10 >= bodyLow) or
                 (ema20 <= bodyHigh and ema20 >= bodyLow)

var int lastRevBar = na
rawLongRev  = recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and isRed
rawShortRev = recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and isGreen
longRev  = rawLongRev  and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
shortRev = rawShortRev and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
if longRev or shortRev
    lastRevBar := bar_index

plotshape(longRev , "RVS Â§öÂèçËΩâ", shape.labeldown, location.abovebar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.rgb(255, 153, 0, 100),
          text="\n\n\RVS-Â§ö\nÂèçËΩâ(ÁúãÂÇôË®ª)\n\n\n\n", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortRev, "RVS Á©∫ÂèçËΩâ", shape.labelup  , location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.rgb(255, 153, 0, 100),
          text="\n\n\RVS-Á©∫\nÂèçËΩâ(ÁúãÂÇôË®ª)", textcolor=color.white)

rvsLongRetraceAdd  = (not longRev)  and recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
rvsShortRetraceAdd = (not shortRev) and recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and (rvsRed   or strongRvsRed)

plotshape(rvsLongRetraceAdd , "RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÂ§ö",  shape.arrowup ,
          location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.green,
          text="Âä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsShortRetraceAdd, "RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÁ©∫",  shape.arrowdown,
          location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red  ,
          text="Âä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)

// ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
// ‚îÇ ‚ë° Â∏ÉÊûó + 6H Doji TP ÂçÄÂ°ä                ‚îÇ
// ‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ
bb_len       = input.int (20 , "Â∏ÉÊûóÊúüÊï∏")
bb_mult      = input.float(2.0, "Â∏ÉÊûó SD ÂÄçÊï∏", step=0.1)
ha_tf        = input.string("360", "HA ÊôÇÈñìÊ°Ü", options=["360","240","120"])
dojiThresh   = input.float(0.10, "ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÈñÄÊ™ª Body%/Range", step=0.01)
cd_bars      = input.int (10 , "ÊúÄÂ∞èÈñìÈöîÊ†πÊï∏", minval=1)
offLong      = input.float(0.5, "TPÂ§ö Ê®ôÁ±§Ë∑ùÈõ¢", step=0.1)
offShort     = input.float(0.5, "TPÁ©∫ Ê®ôÁ±§Ë∑ùÈõ¢", step=0.1)

// ‚â° Ë®àÁÆóÂ∏ÉÊûóÂ∏∂
bb_basis = ta.sma(close, bb_len)
bb_dev   = bb_mult * ta.stdev(close, bb_len)
bb_upper = bb_basis + bb_dev
bb_lower = bb_basis - bb_dev
plot(bb_basis,  "BB ‰∏≠Ëªå", color=color.gray , linewidth=1)
uPlot = plot(bb_upper, "BB ‰∏äËªå", color=color.green)
lPlot = plot(bb_lower, "BB ‰∏ãËªå", color=color.red)
fill(uPlot, lPlot, color=color.new(color.blue, 90))

// ‚â° ÂèñÂæó 6H ÂéüÂßã K Á∑ö ‚Üí HA
[O,H,L,C] = request.security(syminfo.tickerid, ha_tf, [open, high, low, close])
haClose = (O+H+L+C)/4
var float haOpen = na
haOpen := na(haOpen) ? (O+C)/2 : (haOpen[1]+haClose[1])/2
haHigh = math.max(H, math.max(haOpen, haClose))
haLow  = math.min(L, math.min(haOpen, haClose))

bodySize  = math.abs(haClose - haOpen)
rangeSize = haHigh - haLow
bodyRatio = rangeSize > 0 ? bodySize / rangeSize : 1.0
isDojiHA  = bodyRatio <= dojiThresh
isFirstDoji = isDojiHA and not isDojiHA[1]

aboveBasis     = close >= bb_basis
trendWeakLong  = close < close[1]
trendWeakShort = close > close[1]

// ‚â° ÂÜ∑ÂçªÊ©üÂà∂
var int lastLongTPBar  = na
var int lastShortTPBar = na
canLongTP  = na(lastLongTPBar)  or bar_index - lastLongTPBar  > cd_bars
canShortTP = na(lastShortTPBar) or bar_index - lastShortTPBar > cd_bars

// ‚â° Èõ¢Â†¥Âà§ÂÆö
longTP  = isFirstDoji and aboveBasis     and trendWeakLong  and canLongTP
shortTP = isFirstDoji and not aboveBasis and trendWeakShort and canShortTP

if longTP
    label.new(bar_index, bb_upper + offLong, "TPÂ§ö",
              style=label.style_label_down, color=color.rgb(76, 175, 79, 86),
              textcolor=color.white, size=size.normal)
    lastLongTPBar := bar_index

if shortTP
    label.new(bar_index, bb_lower - offShort, "TPÁ©∫",
              style=label.style_label_up, color=color.rgb(255, 0, 0, 77),
              textcolor=color.white, size=size.normal)
    lastShortTPBar := bar_index

// ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
// ‚îÇ ‚ë¢ INFO Ë™™ÊòéÊ®ôÁ±§                          ‚îÇ
// ‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ
infoText =
     "‰ΩøÁî®Ë™™Êòé‰ªãÁ¥π\n"+
     "ÊôÇÈñì3H/4H ÊôÇÈñìËª∏\n"+
     "‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÊîæÂ§ßÂúñÂéªÁúãË™™Êòé,Ê≤íÊúâÁî®Ë´ãÈö±Ëóè\n"+
     "\n"+
     "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
     "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%\n" +
     "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ Âæå 5 Ê†πÂÖßÂÆà‰ΩèÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
     "\n"+
     "------GC/DC‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "GC/ÔºöMACD 6 26 9 Âø´Á∑ö ÈáëÂèâ\n" +
     "DC/ÔºöMACD 6 26 9 Âø´Á∑ö Ê≠ªÂèâ\n" +
     "\n"+
     "------GCÂá∫‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "0.Â¶ÇÊûúGCÂ§öÂñÆ Âá∫ÁèæRVSÊèêÁ§∫„ÄùGCÂá∫„Äû ÊòØÈÅáÂà∞‰∫ÜRVSÊâçÊúÉÈ°ØÁ§∫\n" +
     "1.Âá∫ÁèæRVS- Â¶ÇÊûúRVSÂá∫ÁèæÁöÑÈªûÈÇÑÊ≤í Ê≠ªÂèâ GC ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÜçÁπºÁ∫åÊîæËëó,ÂèØËÉΩÊúÉÂõûË™ø(ÂÅáË∑å) Á≠â‰ªñÂá∫ÁèæÊ≠ªÂèâÂú®Èõ¢Â†¥\n" +
     "2.Ê≠£Â∏∏GC  Â¶ÇÊûúÈÅáÂà∞RVSÊ≠ªÂèâÁõ¥Êé•Èõ¢Â†¥ÔºåÂõ†ÁÇ∫Â•πÊúÉ‰∏ÄÁõ¥ÂæÄ‰∏ãÊéâ‰∏ãÂéªÈô§ÈùûÊíê‰Ωè„ÄÇ\n"+
     "\n"+
     "------DCÂá∫‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "0.Â¶ÇÊûúDCÁ©∫ÂñÆ Âá∫ÁèæRVSÊèêÁ§∫„ÄùDCÂá∫„Äû ÊòØÈÅáÂà∞‰∫ÜRVSÊâçÊúÉÈ°ØÁ§∫\n" +
     "1.Âá∫ÁèæRVS- Â¶ÇÊûúRVSÂá∫ÁèæÁöÑÈªûÈÇÑÊ≤í Ê≠ªÂèâ DC ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÜçÁπºÁ∫åÊîæËëó,ÂèØËÉΩÊúÉÂõûË™ø(ÂÅáÊº≤) Á≠â‰ªñÂá∫ÁèæÊ≠ªÂèâÂú®Èõ¢Â†¥\n" +
     "2.Ê≠£Â∏∏GC  Â¶ÇÊûúÈÅáÂà∞RVSÊ≠ªÂèâÁõ¥Êé•Èõ¢Â†¥ÔºåÂõ†ÁÇ∫Â•πÊúÉ‰∏ÄÁõ¥ÂæÄ‰∏ãÊéâ‰∏ãÂéªÈô§ÈùûÊíê‰Ωè„ÄÇ\n"+
     "\n"+
     "------‚òÖÂ§ö|‚òÖÁ©∫ ‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "‰ª£Ë°®ÈÄôÊ†πKÊ£í RVS Ë∂ÖÈÅé4.5%\n"+
     "ÂæàÂ§ß‰∏ÄÊ†πÔºåÊé•‰∏ã‰æÜÊàëÊúâÂØ´‰∏ÄÂÄãÁ®ãÂºèÁ¢ºÁúã‰ªñÊúÉ‰∏çÊúÉÊíê‰ΩèÈÇÑÊòØÊéâ‰∏ãÂéª\n"+
     "Â¶ÇÊûúÊúâÊíê‰Ωè‰ª£Ë°®‰ªñ‰∏çÊúÉÂæÄ‰∏ãË∑å‰∫ÜÁõ¥Êé•Êíê‰Ωè‰∫Ü\n"+
     "\n"+
     "------TPÂ§ö‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "TPÂ§öÔºöÂ¶ÇÊûúÈÇÑÊ≤íÊ≠ªÂèâÂ∞±‰∏çÁî®TPÔºå‰Ω†‰πü‰∏çÁî®Á≠âÂá∫ÁèæTPÁ©∫ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂá∫ÁèæDCÊ≠ªÂèâ Áõ¥Êé•Èõ¢Â†¥\n"+
          "\n"+
     "------TPÁ©∫‰ªãÁ¥π-----\n"+
     "TPÁ©∫ÔºöÂ¶ÇÊûúÈÇÑÊ≤íÈáëÂèâÂ∞±‰∏çÁî®TÔºå‰Ω†‰πü‰∏çÁî®Á≠âÂá∫ÁèæTPÁ©∫ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂá∫ÁèæGCÈáëÂèâ Áõ¥Êé•Èõ¢Â†¥"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy  (infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === Â§öÊñπË®äËôüÊï¥ÂêàÔºà‰ªª‰∏ÄËß∏ÁôºÔºâ
multiLongSignal =
     goldenCross or gcExit or rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen or
     longRev or rvsLongRetraceAdd or longTP

alertcondition(multiLongSignal, title="üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôü", message="{{ticker}} {{interval}} Âá∫Áèæ üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôü")

// === Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüÊï¥ÂêàÔºà‰ªª‰∏ÄËß∏ÁôºÔºâ
multiShortSignal =
     deathCross or dcExitFinal or rvsRed or strongRvsRed or
     shortRev or rvsShortRetraceAdd or shortTP

alertcondition(multiShortSignal, title="üìâ Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôü", message="{{ticker}} {{interval}} Âá∫Áèæ üìâ Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôü")

title: 4HÊôÇÈñìËª∏ Â∏ÉÊûó + 6H Âπ≥ÂùáK ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÈõ¢Â†¥ÔºàÂÅöÂ§öÈ´òÈªûÈõ¢ÈªûÈªû.ÂÅöÁ©∫‰ΩéÈªûÈõ¢Â†¥Èªû
summary:
Ê®ôÊ∫ñÁöÑÂ∏ÉÊûóÂ∏∂ÈÇèËºØ.Âπ≥ÂùáK (Heikin-Ashi) K Á∑öË≥áÊñôÂèñÂæóÔºà6HÔºâ
ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÂà§Êñ∑ÈÇèËºØ Ë∂®Âã¢Âà§Êñ∑ + ÁµêÊßãÁ¢∫Ë™ç  ÂÜ∑ÂçªÊôÇÈñìÊéßÂà∂ Èõ¢Â†¥Ê¢ù‰ª∂ÈÇèËºØ Áï´Âá∫ TP Ê®ôÁ±§ÔºàË≤ºÂú®Â∏ÉÊûó‰∏ä/‰∏ãËªåÔºâ
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("üìâ Â∏ÉÊûó + 6H Âπ≥ÂùáK ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÈõ¢Â†¥ÔºàË≤ºÂ∏ÉÊûóÁâàÔºâ", overlay=true)

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ ÂèÉÊï∏ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
length         = input.int (20 , "Â∏ÉÊûóÊúüÊï∏", minval=1)
mult           = input.float(2.0, "Ê®ôÊ∫ñÂ∑ÆÂÄçÊï∏", step=0.1)
lookbackHA     = input.string("360", "HA ÊôÇÈñìÊ°Ü", options=["360","240","120"])
dojiThresh     = input.float(0.10, "ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÈñÄÊ™ª Body%/Range", step=0.01)
cooldownBars   = input.int (10 , "ÊúÄÂ∞èÈñìÈöîÊ†πÊï∏", minval=1)
offsetLong     = input.float(0.5, "TPÂ§ö Ê®ôÁ±§Ë∑ùÈõ¢ÔºàÂä†Âú®Â∏ÉÊûó‰∏äËªåÔºâ", step=0.1)
offsetShort    = input.float(0.5, "TPÁ©∫ Ê®ôÁ±§Ë∑ùÈõ¢ÔºàÊ∏õÂú®Â∏ÉÊûó‰∏ãËªåÔºâ", step=0.1)

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ Â∏ÉÊûóÂ∏∂ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
basis = ta.sma(close, length)
dev   = mult * ta.stdev(close, length)
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plot(basis, "‰∏≠Ëªå",  color=color.gray , linewidth=1)
pUp = plot(upper, "‰∏äËªå", color=color.green, linewidth=1)
pDn = plot(lower, "‰∏ãËªå", color=color.red  , linewidth=1)
fill(pUp, pDn, color=color.new(color.blue, 90), title="ÂçÄÈñìËÉåÊôØ")

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ ÂèñÂæó 6H ÂéüÂßã K Á∑ö‰∏¶ËΩâÊàê HA ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
[O,H,L,C] = request.security(syminfo.tickerid, lookbackHA, [open, high, low, close])
haClose = (O+H+L+C)/4
var float haOpen = na
haOpen := na(haOpen) ? (O+C)/2 : (haOpen[1]+haClose[1])/2
haHigh = math.max(H, math.max(haOpen, haClose))
haLow  = math.min(L, math.min(haOpen, haClose))

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ ÂçÅÂ≠óÊòüÂà§ÂÆö ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
bodySize  = math.abs(haClose - haOpen)
rangeSize = haHigh - haLow
bodyRatio = rangeSize > 0 ? bodySize / rangeSize : 1.0
isDojiHA  = bodyRatio <= dojiThresh
isFirstDoji = isDojiHA and not isDojiHA[1]

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ Ë∂®Âã¢ÁµêÊßãÂà§ÂÆö ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
aboveBasis       = close >= basis
trendWeakLong    = close < close[1]
trendWeakShort   = close > close[1]

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ ÂÜ∑ÂçªÊ©üÂà∂ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
var int lastLongBar  = na
var int lastShortBar = na
canLong  = na(lastLongBar)  or bar_index - lastLongBar  > cooldownBars
canShort = na(lastShortBar) or bar_index - lastShortBar > cooldownBars

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ Èõ¢Â†¥Ê¢ù‰ª∂ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
longExit  = isFirstDoji and aboveBasis and trendWeakLong  and canLong
shortExit = isFirstDoji and not aboveBasis and trendWeakShort and canShort

// ‚îÄ‚îÄ È°ØÁ§∫ TP Ê®ôÁ±§ÔºàË≤ºÂ∏ÉÊûóÂ∏∂‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºâ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
if longExit
    label.new(bar_index, upper + offsetLong, "TPÂ§ö", style=label.style_label_down,
              color=color.green, textcolor=color.white, size=size.normal)
    lastLongBar := bar_index

if shortExit
    label.new(bar_index, lower - offsetShort, "TPÁ©∫", style=label.style_label_up,
              color=color.red, textcolor=color.white, size=size.normal)
    lastShortBar := bar_index

title: üìà RVS + GC/DC 3H ÈÄöÁî®Áâà v5.0
pine:
//@version=5
strategy("üìà RVS + GC/DC 3H ÈÄöÁî®Áâà v5.0",
         overlay=true,
         default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity,
         default_qty_value=100)

// === ÂèÉÊï∏ÔºöÈñãÈóú ==============================================
enableBacktest = input.bool(true, "‚úÖ ÂïüÁî®ÂõûÊ∏¨Á≠ñÁï• (ÈóúÈñâÂè™È°ØÁ§∫ÊåáÊ®ô)")

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , title="EMA10", linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , title="EMA20", linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast",   minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow",   minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === K Ê£íË≥áË®ä / RVS Âà§ÂÆö =====================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10Touch = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20Touch = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth  = ema10Touch and ema20Touch

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è =================================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢ ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20

// === ÊúÄËøëÂÖ©Ê†πÊòØÂê¶Âá∫Áèæ RVSÔºàÂê´‚òÖÔºâ==============================
recentLongRvs  = rvsGreen[1] or rvsGreen[2] or strongRvsGreen[1] or strongRvsGreen[2]
recentShortRvs = rvsRed  [1] or rvsRed  [2] or strongRvsRed  [1] or strongRvsRed  [2]

// === Êú¨Ê†πÊúâÁÑ°Ëß∏Á¢∞ EMA10/20 ===================================
bodyTouchEma = ema10Touch or ema20Touch

// === RVS ÂèçËΩâÔºàÈÅøÂÖçÈÄ£Á∫åÔºâ ====================================
var int lastRevBar = na
rawLongRev  = recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and isRed
rawShortRev = recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and isGreen
longRev  = rawLongRev  and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
shortRev = rawShortRev and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
if longRev or shortRev
    lastRevBar := bar_index

// === RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂèØÂä†Á¢ºÔºàÂêåÂêë & ‰∏çËàáÂèçËΩâÂêåÊ†πÔºâ====================
longAdd  = (not longRev)  and recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
shortAdd = (not shortRev) and recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and (rvsRed   or strongRvsRed)

// =================================================================
// === ‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì ‰∫§ÊòìÈÇèËºØ ‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì ============================================
// =================================================================
if enableBacktest
    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ÈÄ≤Â†¥ / Âä†Á¢º ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
    if (rvsGreen or goldenCross or longAdd) and strategy.position_size >= 0
        strategy.entry(id="Long",  direction=strategy.long)
    if (rvsRed   or deathCross  or shortAdd) and strategy.position_size <= 0
        strategy.entry(id="Short", direction=strategy.short)

    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ Âá∫Â†¥ ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
    if strategy.position_size > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross or longRev)
        strategy.close("Long",  comment="Exit Â§ö")
    if strategy.position_size < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross or shortRev)
        strategy.close("Short", comment="Exit Á©∫")

// =================================================================
// === Ë¶ñË¶∫ÂåñÊ®ôË®òÔºàËàáÊåáÊ®ôÁâà‰∏ÄËá¥Ôºâ==================================
plotshape(goldenCross , title="GC", style=shape.triangleup  , location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime , size=size.small, text="GCÂÅöÂ§ö", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross  , title="DC", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.red  , size=size.small, text="DCÂÅöÁ©∫", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS ÂÅöÂ§ö", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-‚òÖ Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS-‚òÖ ÂÅöÂ§ö", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS-‚òÖ ÂÅöÁ©∫", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.triangleup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

plotshape(longRev ,  title="RVS-Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange, text="RVS-Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortRev,  title="RVS-Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", style=shape.labelup  , location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange, text="RVS-Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(longAdd ,  title="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Long",  style=shape.arrowup , location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.green, text="RVSÂõûÊ¢ù\nÂä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortAdd,  title="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Short", style=shape.arrowdown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red  , text="RVSÂõûÊ¢ù\nÂä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)

// === Âõ∫ÂÆöÂè≥‰∏äËßíË™™Êòé ==========================================
infoText = "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
           "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
           "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
           "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%ÔºåË∂ÖÂº∑ÂèçËΩâ\n" +
           "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ ‰ΩÜÁ´ôÂõûÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
           "üü© 6.26.9 GCÔºöMACD ÈáëÂèâ\n" +
           "üü• 6.26.9 DCÔºöMACD Ê≠ªÂèâ\n" +
           "‚ö†Ô∏è RVS ÂèçËΩâÔºöËøë 2 Ê†πÂá∫Áèæ RVS ÂæåÊú¨Ê†πÈ°èËâ≤ÂèçÂêë‰∏îÁ¢∞ EMA\n" +
           "üîÑ RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÔºöËøë 2 Ê†πÂêåÂêë RVS ÂæåÊú¨Ê†πÂÜçÁ¢∞ EMA ÂèØÂä†Á¢º\n" +
           "‚öôÔ∏è ÂõûÊ∏¨ÈñãÈóúÔºö" + (enableBacktest ? "ON" : "OFF")

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === Âø´Ë®ä ====================================================
alertcondition(goldenCross , title="‚ùáÔ∏è GC ÂÅöÂ§ö", message="GC ÂÅöÂ§öË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")
alertcondition(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="üíú RVS ÂÅöÂ§ö", message="RVS ÂÅöÂ§öË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")
alertcondition(longRev,  title="‚õî RVS Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâ",  message="RVS Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâË≠¶Á§∫ÔºåË´ãÁïôÊÑèÂπ≥ÂÄâÔºÅ")
alertcondition(longAdd,  title="üîÑ RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Long",  message="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÊªøË∂≥ÔºåÂä†Á¢ºÂ§öÂñÆÔºÅ")

alertcondition(deathCross , title="üîª DC ÂÅöÁ©∫", message="DC ÂÅöÁ©∫Ë®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")
alertcondition(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed , title="üíú RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫", message="RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫Ë®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")
alertcondition(shortRev, title="‚õî RVS Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", message="RVS Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâË≠¶Á§∫ÔºåË´ãÁïôÊÑèÂπ≥ÂÄâÔºÅ")
alertcondition(shortAdd, title="üîÑ RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Short", message="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÊªøË∂≥ÔºåÂä†Á¢ºÁ©∫ÂñÆÔºÅ")

title: RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÊú¨ÔºàÂê´ RVS ÂèçËΩâ & ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÔºâÁæ§ÁµÑÂçáÁ¥öÊ¨æÂèØËÄÉÊÖÆÈÄôÊ¨æÔºåÊúâÂä†Á¢ºÊèêÁ§∫
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("üìå RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÊú¨ÔºàÂê´ RVS ÂèçËΩâ & ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÔºâ", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD ÈáëÂèâ", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD Ê≠ªÂèâ", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K Ê£í / RVS ==============================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       =  isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         =  isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÈÇèËºØ ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢ ==============================================
plotshape(low  > ema10 and low  > ema20, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(high < ema10 and high < ema20, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-‚òÖ Ê®ôË®ò ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-‚òÖ Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè‰∫Ü", textcolor=color.white)

// === Ëøë 2 Ê†πÊòØÂê¶Êúâ RVSÔºàÂê´ RVS-‚òÖÔºâ============================
recentLongRvs  = rvsGreen[1] or rvsGreen[2] or strongRvsGreen[1] or strongRvsGreen[2]
recentShortRvs = rvsRed  [1] or rvsRed  [2] or strongRvsRed  [1] or strongRvsRed  [2]

// Êú¨Ê†πÂØ¶È´îÊòØÂê¶Á¢∞Âà∞ EMA10 / 20
bodyTouchEma = (ema10 <= bodyHigh and ema10 >= bodyLow) or
               (ema20 <= bodyHigh and ema20 >= bodyLow)

// === ‚ö†Ô∏è RVS ÂèçËΩâÔºàÈÅøÂÖçÈÄ£Á∫åÈ°ØÁ§∫Ôºâ==============================
var int lastRevBar = na  // Ë®òÈåÑÊúÄÂæå‰∏ÄÊ¨°Áï´ÂèçËΩâÊ®ôÁ±§ÁöÑ bar_index

rawLongRev  = recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and isRed
rawShortRev = recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and isGreen

longRev  = rawLongRev  and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)
shortRev = rawShortRev and (na(lastRevBar) or bar_index - lastRevBar > 1)

// Ëã•Áï´Ê®ôÁ±§ ‚Üí Êõ¥Êñ∞ lastRevBar
if longRev or shortRev
    lastRevBar := bar_index

plotshape(longRev,  title="RVS-Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange,
          text="RVS-Â§öÂñÆÂèçËΩâ-ÂèØÂä†ÂÄâ", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(shortRev, title="RVS-Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâ", style=shape.labelup,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.orange,
          text="RVS-Á©∫ÂñÆÂèçËΩâ-ÂèØÂä†ÂÄâ", textcolor=color.white)

// === üîÑ RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂèØÂä†Á¢ºÔºàÂêåÂêë & Á¢∞ EMAÔºõËã•Â∑≤ÂèçËΩâÂâá‰∏çÁï´Ôºâ=======
rvsLongRetraceAdd  = (not longRev)  and recentLongRvs  and bodyTouchEma and (rvsGreen or strongRvsGreen)
rvsShortRetraceAdd = (not shortRev) and recentShortRvs and bodyTouchEma and (rvsRed   or strongRvsRed)

plotshape(rvsLongRetraceAdd,  title="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Long",  style=shape.arrowup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.green,
          text="RVSÂõûÊ¢ù\nÂèØÂä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsShortRetraceAdd, title="RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢º Short", style=shape.arrowdown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.red,
          text="RVSÂõûÊ¢ù\nÂèØÂä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)

// === Âõ∫ÂÆöÂè≥‰∏äËßíË™™Êòé ==========================================
infoText =
     "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
     "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%\n" +
     "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ ‰ΩÜÁ´ôÂõûÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
     "üü© 6.26.9 GCÔºöMACD ÈáëÂèâ\n" +
     "üü• 6.26.9 DCÔºöMACD Ê≠ªÂèâ\n" +
     "‚ö†Ô∏è RVS Âæå 2 Ê†πËã•Á¢∞ÂùáÁ∑ö‰∏îÈ°èËâ≤ÂèçÂêë ‚Üí ÂèçËΩâË≠¶Á§∫Ôºà‰∏çÈÄ£Á∫åÈ°ØÁ§∫Ôºâ\n" +
     "üîÑ RVS Âæå 2 Ê†πËã•ÂêåÂêë‰∏îÁ¢∞ÂùáÁ∑ö ‚Üí ÂõûÊ¢ùÂèØÂä†Á¢º-‰ΩçÁΩÆË´ãÁúãÂõûÊ≠∑Âè≤ÊîØÊíêÈòªÂäõË®≠ÁΩÆÈªû‰Ωç"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy   (infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text (infoLabel, infoText)

// === Âá∫Â†¥Ê¢ù‰ª∂ ================================================
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen

// === ÁµÑÂêàÂø´Ë®äÔºàÂê´ÂèçËΩâ / ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÔºâ============================
longGroupAlert  = goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort or longRev  or rvsLongRetraceAdd
shortGroupAlert = deathCross  or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong  or shortRev or rvsShortRetraceAdd

alertcondition(longGroupAlert , title="üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºàÂê´ÂèçËΩâ/ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÔºâ",
               message="üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôüÔºöGC / RVS ÂÅöÂ§ö / Âπ≥Á©∫ / ÂèçËΩâË≠¶Á§∫ / RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂèØÂä†Á¢º")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="üìâ Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºàÂê´ÂèçËΩâ/ÂõûÊ¢ùÂä†Á¢ºÔºâ",
               message="üìâ Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüÔºöDC / RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫ / Âπ≥Â§ö / ÂèçËΩâË≠¶Á§∫ / RVS ÂõûÊ¢ùÂèØÂä†Á¢º")

title: RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÊú¨+Â∞çÈΩäÂä†Á¢ºÁ≠ñÁï•ÁâàÊú¨ [‰∏çË¶Å‰∫ÇÁî®] ÊÄï‰Ω†Áúã‰∏çÊáÇ
summary:
Ë´ãÂãøÂ§ñÊµÅ!!! Ë´ãÂãøÂ§ñÊµÅ!!! Ë´ãÂãøÂ§ñÊµÅ!!!
Âè∞ÂçóÊàêÈï∑Âûã_Â∞èÁêÜË≤°Âúà Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊâãËÖ≥Êú¨
ÈÄôÊòØ‰∏ÄÂ•ó ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•„ÄÅÁ¥îÊåáÊ®ôÂûãËÖ≥Êú¨ÔºåÂ∞àÁÇ∫ Ë¶ñË¶∫Ëæ®Ë≠ò + Âø´Ë®äÊèêÈÜí + Âä†Á¢ºÊèêÁ§∫ Ë®≠Ë®à„ÄÇ
ÂÆåÁæéÂ∞çÊáâÂØ¶Êà∞Êìç‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ãÔºåÊîØÊè¥‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÊÄßÊá∂‰∫∫Âø´Ë®äË®≠ÂÆöÔºå‰∏çÈúÄÊâãÂãïË™øÊï¥Á≠ñÁï•ÂèÉÊï∏„ÄÇ

‚úÖ ÂÖßÂê´ÂÅµÊ∏¨Ê®°ÁµÑÔºö
EMA10 / EMA20 ÈõôÂùáÁ∑ö

MACD ÈáëÂèâ / Ê≠ªÂèâÔºà6-26-9Ôºâ

RVS / RVS-‚òÖ ÂåÖ‰ΩèÂà§Êñ∑ÔºàÂê´ 2%„ÄÅ4.5% ÂØ¶È´îÔºâ

Êíê‰Ωèüõ°Ô∏èÂà§Êñ∑ÔºàRVS ÂæåÊãâÂõûÁ´ôÁ©©Ôºâ
Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÁ©∫ÂΩ¢ÊÖãÔºàÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº / ‰ΩéÊñºÈõô EMAÔºâ
üìà Â§öÂñÆÂä†Á¢ºÔºèüìâ Á©∫ÂñÆÂä†Á¢ºÔºàËàáÁ≠ñÁï•ÁâàÊú¨ÂêåÊ≠•‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºâ
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("üìå RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÔºàÂê´Â§öÁ©∫Âä†Á¢ºÔºâ", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue, linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD ÈáëÂèâ", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime, size=size.small,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD Ê≠ªÂèâ", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, color=color.red , size=size.small,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K Ê£í / RVS Áõ∏Èóú =========================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÈÇèËºØ ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢ ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.triangleup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-‚òÖ Ê®ôË®ò ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-‚òÖ Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè‰∫Ü", textcolor=color.white)

// === Âõ∫ÂÆöÂè≥‰∏äËßíË™™Êòé ==========================================
infoText =
     "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
     "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%\n" +
     "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ ‰ΩÜÁ´ôÂõûÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
     "üü© 6.26.9 GCÔºöMACD ÈáëÂèâ\n" +
     "üü• 6.26.9 DCÔºöMACD Ê≠ªÂèâ\n" +
     "üìà Âä†Á¢º Long / üìâ Âä†Á¢º ShortÔºöËàáÁ≠ñÁï•ÈÄ≤Â†¥Âêå‰ΩçÁΩÆ"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,
               xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price,
               style=label.style_label_left, size=size.small,
               color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// ============================================================
// === ‚úÖ Â§öÂñÆÔºèÁ©∫ÂñÆ„ÄåÂä†Á¢º„ÄçÊ¢ù‰ª∂ÔºàËàáÁ≠ñÁï• Long/Short ÂêåÊ≠•Ôºâ =====
// ============================================================
// ‚ÄºÔ∏è ‰ΩøÁî® [1] ‚Üí Ââç‰∏ÄÊ†π K Ê£íÊªøË∂≥Ê¢ù‰ª∂ ‚Üí ÂúñÁ§∫Áï´Âú®Êú¨Ê†π = Á≠ñÁï•ÂØ¶ÈöõÈÄ≤Â†¥Ê†π
longAdd  = ta.crossover(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsGreen[1] and not strongRvsGreen[1])
shortAdd = ta.crossunder(macdLine[1], signalLine[1]) or (rvsRed[1]   and not strongRvsRed[1])

// --- Áï´Âä†Á¢ºÊèêÁ§∫ ----------------------------------------------
plotshape(longAdd,  title="üìà Âä†Á¢º Long",  style=shape.arrowup  ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small,
          color=color.green, text="Âä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(shortAdd, title="üìâ Âä†Á¢º Short", style=shape.arrowdown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small,
          color=color.red  , text="Âä†Á¢º", textcolor=color.white)

// === Âø´Ë®äÊ¢ù‰ª∂ÔºöÂá∫Â†¥Ôºà‰øùÊåÅÂéüÈÇèËºØÔºâ ============================
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen

// === ÁµÑÂêàÂø´Ë®äÊ¢ù‰ª∂ÔºàÂä†ÂÖ•Âä†Á¢ºÔºâ ================================
longGroupAlert  = longAdd  or goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort
shortGroupAlert = shortAdd or deathCross  or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong

alertcondition(longGroupAlert , title="üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºàÂê´Âä†Á¢ºÔºâ", message="Â§öÊñπË®äËôüÔºöGC / RVS ÂÅöÂ§ö Êàñ Â§öÂñÆÂä†Á¢º / Âπ≥Á©∫")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="üìâ Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºàÂê´Âä†Á¢ºÔºâ", message="Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüÔºöDC / RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫ Êàñ Á©∫ÂñÆÂä†Á¢º / Âπ≥Â§ö")

title: üìà RVS + GC/DC 4H ÈÄöÁî®Áâà v4.0 Áæ§ÁµÑËàäÊ¨æ
pine:
//@version=5
strategy("üìà RVS + GC/DC 4H ÈÄöÁî®Áâà v4.0", overlay=true,
     default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity, default_qty_value=100)

// === ÈñãÈóúÔºöÂïüÁî®ÂõûÊ∏¨Á≠ñÁï• ===
enableBacktest = input.bool(true, "‚úÖ ÂïüÁî®ÂõûÊ∏¨Á≠ñÁï• (ÈóúÈñâÂè™È°ØÁ§∫ÊåáÊ®ô)")

// === EMA
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue , title="EMA10", linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red  , title="EMA20", linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6‚Äë26‚Äë9
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast",   minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow",   minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === K Ê£íÂØ¶È´îË≥áË®ä
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodySize = math.abs(close - open)
bodyPct  = bodySize / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

// === ÊòØÂê¶ÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10 / 20
ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

// === RVS & RVS‚Äë‚òÖ
rvsGreen        = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed          = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen  = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed    = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045
isStrongRVS     = strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed

// === üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÈÇèËºØ
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if isStrongRVS
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index
lookback = 5
barsSinceLastRvs = bar_index - lastRvsBar
isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and barsSinceLastRvs > 0 and barsSinceLastRvs <= lookback and isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20

// === ÈÄ≤Âá∫Â†¥Á≠ñÁï• ===
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size == 0
    if rvsGreen or goldenCross
        strategy.entry("Long", strategy.long)
    if rvsRed or deathCross
        strategy.entry("Short", strategy.short)

if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
    strategy.close("Long", comment="Exit Â§ö")
if enableBacktest and strategy.position_size < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
    strategy.close("Short", comment="Exit Á©∫")

// === Ê®°Êì¨ Exit Ê®ôÁ±§
showExitLong  = strategy.position_size[1] > 0 and (rvsRed or deathCross)
showExitShort = strategy.position_size[1] < 0 and (rvsGreen or goldenCross)
exitYOffset = (high - low) * 1.5

if showExitLong
    label.new(bar_index, high + exitYOffset, "‚õîÂπ≥Â§ö", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_down,
              color=color.red, textcolor=color.white, size=size.small)
if showExitShort
    label.new(bar_index, low - exitYOffset, "‚õîÂπ≥Á©∫", yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_up,
              color=color.lime, textcolor=color.black, size=size.small)

// === Ë¶ñË¶∫Ê®ôË®ò
plotshape(goldenCross , title="GC", style=shape.triangleup   , location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime , size=size.small, text="GCÂÅöÂ§ö",textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(deathCross  , title="DC", style=shape.triangledown , location=location.abovebar, color=color.red  , size=size.small, text="DCÂÅöÁ©∫",textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS ÂÅöÂ§ö", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed ,   title="RVS Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=color.fuchsia, size=size.tiny, text="RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-‚òÖ Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup , location=location.belowbar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS‚Äë‚òÖ ÂÅöÂ§ö", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed , title="RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown, location=location.abovebar, color=#FFD700, size=size.tiny, text="RVS‚Äë‚òÖ ÂÅöÁ©∫", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(isHold, title="Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.triangleup, location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.triangledown, location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === Âõ∫ÂÆöÂè≥‰∏äËßíË™™Êòé
infoText = "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
           "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
           "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
           "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%ÔºåË∂ÖÂº∑ÂèçËΩâ\n" +
           "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ ‰ΩÜÁ´ôÂõûÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
           "üü© 6.26.9 GCÔºöMACD ÈáëÂèâÔºåÁü≠Á∑öËΩâÂº∑\n" +
           "üü• 6.26.9 DCÔºöMACD Ê≠ªÂèâÔºåÁü≠Á∑öËΩâÂº±\n" +
           "‚öôÔ∏è ÂõûÊ∏¨ÈñãÈóúÔºö" + (enableBacktest ? "ON" : "OFF")

rightShift = 11

// === Âø´Ë®äÊ¢ù‰ª∂ ==========================
alertcondition(goldenCross , title = "‚ùáÔ∏è GC ÂÅöÂ§ö", message = "GC ÂÅöÂ§öË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")

alertcondition(showExitLong , title = "‚õî Âπ≥Â§ö", message = "Âπ≥Â§öÂá∫Â†¥Ë®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")

alertcondition(rvsRed and not strongRvsRed , title = "üíú RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫", message = "RVS ÂÅöÁ©∫Ë®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")
alertcondition(showExitShort, title = "‚õî Âπ≥Á©∫", message = "Âπ≥Á©∫Âá∫Â†¥Ë®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºÅ")

title: RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÊú¨ Áæ§ÁµÑËàäÊ¨æ
pine:
//@version=5
indicator("üìå RDÁèæË≤®-ÁÑ°Á≠ñÁï•+È¨ßÈêòÁâàÊú¨", overlay=true)

// === EMA =====================================================
ema10 = ta.ema(close, 10)
ema20 = ta.ema(close, 20)
plot(ema10, color=color.blue, linewidth=2)
plot(ema20, color=color.red , linewidth=2)

// === MACD 6-26-9 =============================================
fastLen   = input.int(6 , "MACD Fast Length"  , minval=1)
slowLen   = input.int(26, "MACD Slow Length"  , minval=1)
signalLen = input.int(9 , "MACD Signal Length", minval=1)
[macdLine, signalLine, _] = ta.macd(close, fastLen, slowLen, signalLen)

goldenCross = ta.crossover(macdLine, signalLine)
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macdLine, signalLine)

// === Áï´ GC / DC Ê®ôË®ò =========================================
plotshape(goldenCross, title="MACD ÈáëÂèâ", style=shape.triangleup,
          location=location.belowbar, color=color.lime, size=size.small,
          text="GC", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(deathCross , title="MACD Ê≠ªÂèâ", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, color=color.red, size=size.small,
          text="DC", textcolor=color.white)

// === K Ê£í / RVS Áõ∏Èóú =========================================
bodyHigh = math.max(open, close)
bodyLow  = math.min(open, close)
bodyPct  = math.abs(close - open) / open
isGreen  = close > open
isRed    = close < open

ema10InBody = ema10 >= bodyLow and ema10 <= bodyHigh
ema20InBody = ema20 >= bodyLow and ema20 <= bodyHigh
touchBoth   = ema10InBody and ema20InBody

rvsGreen       = isGreen and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
rvsRed         = isRed   and touchBoth and bodyPct >= 0.02
strongRvsGreen = rvsGreen and bodyPct >= 0.045
strongRvsRed   = rvsRed   and bodyPct >= 0.045

// === üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÈÇèËºØ ============================================
var float lastRvsLow = na
var int   lastRvsBar = na
if strongRvsGreen or strongRvsRed
    lastRvsLow := low
    lastRvsBar := bar_index

isHold = not na(lastRvsLow) and
         bar_index - lastRvsBar > 0 and bar_index - lastRvsBar <= 5 and
         isGreen and low <= lastRvsLow and
         (close >= ema10 or close >= ema20)

// === Â§ñÈÉ®‰∏âËßíÂΩ¢ ==============================================
isFullyAbove = low  > ema10 and low  > ema20
isFullyBelow = high < ema10 and high < ema20
plotshape(isFullyAbove, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.triangleup,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.small, color=color.lime)
plotshape(isFullyBelow, title="Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.triangledown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.small, color=color.orange)

// === RVS / RVS-‚òÖ Ê®ôË®ò ========================================
plotshape(rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen, title="RVS Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)
plotshape(rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed  , title="RVS Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=color.fuchsia,
          text="RVS", textcolor=color.white)

plotshape(strongRvsGreen, title="RVS-‚òÖ Â§öÈ†≠", style=shape.labelup ,
          location=location.belowbar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)
plotshape(strongRvsRed  , title="RVS-‚òÖ Á©∫È†≠", style=shape.labeldown,
          location=location.abovebar, size=size.tiny, color=#FFD700,
          text="RVS-‚òÖ", textcolor=color.black)

plotshape(isHold, title="Êíê‰Ωè üõ°Ô∏è", style=shape.labelup, location=location.belowbar,
          size=size.tiny, color=color.teal, text="üõ°Ô∏èÊíê‰Ωè‰∫Ü", textcolor=color.white)

// === Âõ∫ÂÆöÂè≥‰∏äËßíË™™Êòé ==========================================
infoText =
     "üü¢‚ñ≤ Â§ñÈÉ®Â§öÈ†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†πÈ´òÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü†‚ñº Â§ñÈÉ®Á©∫È†≠ÔºöÊï¥Ê†π‰ΩéÊñº EMA10/20\n" +
     "üü™ RVSÔºöÂåÖ‰Ωè EMA10/20ÔºåÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 2%\n" +
     "‚≠ê RVS-‚òÖÔºöÂØ¶È´î ‚â• 4.5%\n" +
     "üõ°Ô∏è Êíê‰ΩèÔºö‰ΩéÊñº RVS-‚òÖ ‰ΩÜÁ´ôÂõûÂùáÁ∑ö\n" +
     "üü© 6.26.9 GCÔºöMACD ÈáëÂèâ\n" +
     "üü• 6.26.9 DCÔºöMACD Ê≠ªÂèâ"

rightShift = 11
topY = ta.highest(high, 5) * 1.04
var label infoLabel = na
if na(infoLabel)
    infoLabel := label.new(bar_index + rightShift, topY, infoText,xloc=xloc.bar_index, yloc=yloc.price, style=label.style_label_left,size=size.small, color=color.new(#000000, 100), textcolor=color.white)
else
    label.set_xy(infoLabel, bar_index + rightShift, topY),
    label.set_text(infoLabel, infoText)

// === Âø´Ë®äÊ¢ù‰ª∂ÔºöÂá∫Â†¥
exitLong  = deathCross or rvsRed     // Â§öÂñÆË©≤Âá∫Â†¥ÔºàÂá∫ÁèæÁ©∫Ë®äÔºâ
exitShort = goldenCross or rvsGreen  // Á©∫ÂñÆË©≤Âá∫Â†¥ÔºàÂá∫ÁèæÂ§öË®äÔºâ

// === ÁµÑÂêàÂø´Ë®äÊ¢ù‰ª∂
longGroupAlert  = goldenCross or (rvsGreen and not strongRvsGreen) or exitShort
shortGroupAlert = deathCross or (rvsRed   and not strongRvsRed)   or exitLong

alertcondition(longGroupAlert, title="üìà Â§öÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºöGC„ÄÅRVS ÂÅöÂ§öÊàñ Âπ≥Á©∫", message="Â§öÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºöGC„ÄÅRVS ÂÅöÂ§öÊàñ Âπ≥Á©∫")
alertcondition(shortGroupAlert, title="üìâ Â§öÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºöGC„ÄÅRVS ÂÅöÂ§öÊàñ Âπ≥Á©∫", message="Á©∫ÊñπË®äËôüËß∏ÁôºÔºöDC„ÄÅRVS ÂÅöÁ©∫Êàñ Âπ≥Â§ö")

title: MACD 6.26.9 Á¥ÖÁ∂†ÈªûË®≠Ë®à Áæ§ÁµÑÊ¨æÁî®ÈÄôÂÄã
summary: ÊîπËâØÁâàÁöÑ MACD ÊåáÊ®ôÔºàÁßªÂãïÂπ≥ÂùáÊî∂ÊñÇËÉåÈõ¢ÊåáÊ®ôÔºâÔºå‰∏çÂè™Áï´Âá∫ÂÇ≥Áµ±ÁöÑ MACD Á∑öËàá Signal Á∑öÔºåÈÇÑ È°çÂ§ñÂú®ÈáëÂèâËàáÊ≠ªÂèâÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÊ®ôË®òÁ∂†Ëâ≤ËàáÁ¥ÖËâ≤ÂúìÈªûÔºåÂçîÂä©Áî®Êà∂Ë¶ñË¶∫‰∏äÂø´ÈÄüËæ®Ë≠òÂ§öÁ©∫Ë®äËôü„ÄÇ
pine:
//@version=6
indicator(title="MACD 6.26.9 Á¥ÖÁ∂†ÈªûË®≠Ë®à", shorttitle="MACD", overlay=false)

// === ÂèÉÊï∏ ===
fast_length   = input.int(title="Fast Length",   defval=12, minval=1, maxval=50)
slow_length   = input.int(title="Slow Length",   defval=26, minval=1, maxval=100)
signal_length = input.int(title="Signal Smoothing", defval=9,  minval=1, maxval=50)

sma_source = input.string(title="MACD MA Type",  defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])
sma_signal = input.string(title="Signal MA Type", defval="EMA", options=["SMA", "EMA"])

src = input.source(title="Source", defval=close)

// === Ê®£Âºè ===
macdColor    = input.color(title="MACD Á∑öÈ°èËâ≤",   defval=color.blue)
signalColor  = input.color(title="Signal Á∑öÈ°èËâ≤", defval=color.orange)
macdWidth    = input.int(title="MACD Á∑öÂØ¨",       defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)
signalWidth  = input.int(title="Signal Á∑öÂØ¨",     defval=1, minval=1, maxval=5)

// === Ë®àÁÆó ===
fast_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, fast_length) : ta.ema(src, fast_length)
slow_ma = sma_source == "SMA" ? ta.sma(src, slow_length) : ta.ema(src, slow_length)
macd    = fast_ma - slow_ma
signal  = sma_signal == "SMA" ? ta.sma(macd, signal_length) : ta.ema(macd, signal_length)

// === ÂúñÂΩ¢ ===
hline(0, "Zero Line", color=color.new(color.gray, 60))
plot(macd,   title="MACD Line",   color=macdColor,   linewidth=macdWidth)
plot(signal, title="Signal Line", color=signalColor, linewidth=signalWidth)

// === ÈáëÂèâ / Ê≠ªÂèâ Ê®ôË®ò ===
goldenCross = ta.crossover(macd, signal)   // Âø´Á∑ö‰∏äÁ©ø ‚Üí ÈáëÂèâ
deathCross  = ta.crossunder(macd, signal)  // Âø´Á∑ö‰∏ãÁ©ø ‚Üí Ê≠ªÂèâ

plot(goldenCross ? macd : na, title="Golden Cross Point", style=plot.style_circles, color=color.lime, linewidth=3)
plot(deathCross  ? macd : na, title="Death Cross Point",  style=plot.style_circles, color=color.red,  linewidth=3)
